userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain beginning in 2071. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection of American Workers Party materials consists of four folders: Essays for Basic Study Group; Issue Mailings; Leaflets; Position Papers; and was accompanied by an item-level list of the contents of these folders. The contents include some items by other U.S. Marxist-Leninist organizations. In addition to contemporary issues, a significant portion of the material is concerned with the history and internal politics of the AWP.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The American Workers Party (1970s-1980s) was a Marxist-Leninst group based in New York City.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
